resources.string:
Layout and Conversion
This app contains a simple layout. The first thing you notice is the 2 scroll wheels in the center. 
Use the left wheel to set the currency which you want to convert and use the right wheel to set the currency you want it to be converted to. 
Use the Input box above the left wheel to enter the amount to be converted.
The result will be displayed below the wheel.
Updating Rates
The app stores the rates in a database. The values can be updated from online sources(requires data connection) by pressing the "Update Rates" button.
In any conversion the most recently updated values in the database will be used.
